entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, completely unaware that he was being watched by Crouch.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A person who is seemingly mad and has released Harry from his bonds. He is convinced that Percy is standing in front of him, but it's actually a tree.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: A person who is with Crouch and seems to be doubting his sanity. He is told by Harry to stay with Crouch while he goes to get Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, who needs to be informed about something urgent by Crouch.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone that Crouch thinks is standing in front of him, but it's actually a tree.

relationships.description: Crouch was watching Harry without his knowledge, which surprised him so much that he didn't notice Crouch releasing him.
Harry told Krum to stay with Crouch while he went to get Dumbledore.
Crouch needs to warn Dumbledore about something urgent, as mentioned in his whispers to Harry.
